Uses of Class
edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.ideal.simplify.AffineExpression

  • Packages that use AffineExpression 
    Package Description
    edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.ideal.simplify
    The simplification package for ideal2 (mathematical) arithmetic.

    • Uses of AffineExpression in edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.ideal.simplify

      Methods in edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.ideal.simplify that return AffineExpression 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AffineExpression AffineFactory.affine(Monic pseudo, Number coefficient, Number offset) 
      AffineExpression AffineFactory.affine(Polynomial poly)
      Computes a representation of the given Polynomial as an AffineExpression aX+b, where X is in pseudo form.
      Methods in edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.ideal.simplify with parameters of type AffineExpression 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Number AffineFactory.affineValue(AffineExpression affine, Number pseudoValue)
      Given a value for the "pseudo" X, returns the value of the affine expressions aX+b.
      Number AffineFactory.bound(AffineExpression affine, boolean gt, boolean strict)
      Determines a bound on the pseudo primitive polynomial X, assuming the predicate aX+b OP 0 holds, where OP is one of <,<=,>,>=.
